title: Ticket #6722: HTCondor does not support s3 URLs
description:
The function that determines whether a string is a URL disallows valid protocols such as s3

This ticket inspired by the following github pull request: https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/pull/23
remarks:
2018-Jul-30 10:22:42 by tlmiller:
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986#section-3.1

Jaime believes that the NorduGrid code shouldn't have any problems as a result of updating IsUrl() to match reality. TJ believes the same of the file transfer code; those two appear to be the main two users of this code.

If we already link libcurl to condor_utils, we should just replace IsUrl() with the appropriate method(s) from libcurl. Otherwise, we should reimplement.

2018-Aug-21 11:53:56 by tim:
CODE and DOC REVIEW: Looks good.
